name: ZAG Technical Services
description:
ZAG Technical Services, Inc. was founded in 1998 with the intention of being a trusted IT adviser for our clients. This means the client comes first.
ZAG aims to understand your company's business needs and tailor an IT solution to enable you to succeed. We believe that technology should add value to an organization, rather than be seen as a necessary expense. As your IT Partner, ZAG drives the idea that technology should be an integral part of your organization by coinciding your business initiatives with your IT environment.  
We have the unique ability to architect an IT solution that is implemented successfully and maintained going forward. This ability takes us beyond simply being IT consultants and makes ZAG your IT partner. Our goal is to enable our clients to succeed through implementing information technology-based business solutions.
Our services include Network Design, System Implementation, Managed Services, Technology Assessments, and Post-Implementation Support Services. ZAG partners with vendors like Microsoft, Cisco, Citrix, VMware and more.
